name: Postknight
storyline: The story follows the adventures of a Postknight — a knight who is tasked with difficult or dangerous deliveries — in the grand kingdom of Kurestal. Through deliveries, the postknight will meet other characters with different backgrounds while venturing across the kingdom of Kurestal and beyond.
summary:
Step into the shoes of a Postknight and experience and exciting RPG adventure on-the-go!

Highlighting the best elements of a role-playing games, Postknight allows you to experience the best in bite-sized pieces. Play when you can, and let your postknight grow when you are not!

Perfect for mobile players, Postknight provides quality content in reasonable sizes, adequate controls for your adventure, and rewards you when you have to take a break from the game too!

Uphold the postknight’s motto of delivering anything to anywhere! Meet recipients and others who will help you in your quest to rank up as a postknight and traverse the kingdom of Kurestal! Visit humble villages, breezy towns and grand cities for your deliveries.
